results.name: Triangle T with T(n,n)=n, T(n,n-1)=-(n-1) and otherwise T(n,k)=0; 0<k<=n.
comment: The positive version with row sums 2n+1 is given by T(n,k)=sum{j=k..n, C(n,j)*C(j,k)*(-1)^(n-j)*(j+1)}. - _Paul Barry_, May 26 2007
Binomial transform of unsigned sequence is A003506. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 29 2007
Table T(n,k) read by antidiagonals. T(n,1) = n (for n>1), T(n,2) = -n, T(n,k) = 0, k > 2. - _Boris Putievskiy_, Feb 07 2013
link: Boris Putievskiy, Transformations [of] Integer Sequences And Pairing Functions arXiv:1212.2732 [math.CO]
formula: Number triangle T(n,k)=sum{j=k..n, C(n,j)*C(j,k)*(-1)^(j-k)*(j+1)}. - _Paul Barry_, May 26 2007
